byline.contributor: Saeed al-Batati reported from Mukalla, and Kareem Fahim from Cairo.
byline.original: By SAEED AL-BATATI and KAREEM FAHIM

abstract: Yemeni fighters thought to have received training in Saudi Arabia and other Persian Gulf states join fight against Houthi rebels in Aden, Yemen; if confirmed, influx will represent first major deployment of Saudi-led troops in Yemen's conflict.
lead_paragraph: As the airstrikes have continued, the Saudis appear to be more aggressively empowering proxy forces with the first major deployment of ground troops that trained.

headline.main: Yemeni Fighters Trained in Persian Gulf Are Said to Join Saudi-Led Mission
headline.print_headline: Yemeni Fighters Trained in Gulf Are Said to Join Saudi-Led Mission

snippet: As the airstrikes have continued, the Saudis appear to be more aggressively empowering proxy forces with the first major deployment of ground troops that trained.
